getnewappinfo.info: ◆ Easy in-App updates, now the app will notify you when a new update is available   ◆ New features are displayed on the home page   ◆ Added ability to define custom MAC by Server   ◆ Fixed transparent background issue when video doesnt have 16:9 aspect ratio
